itemInfo.itemDesc: A material used for Crafting equipment.\nIt can be Excavated at Mansha Forest.

item.name: Kalis Longsword
item.desc: A longsword capable of reaching the highest potential of its kind.

item.name: Kalis Longbow
item.desc: A longbow capable of reaching the highest potential of its kind.

item.name: Kalis Amulet
item.desc: An amulet capable of reaching the highest potential of its kind.

item.name: Kalis Axe
item.desc: An axe capable of reaching the highest potential of its kind.

item.name: Kalis Shortsword
item.desc: A Shortsword capable of reaching the highest potential of its kind.

item.name: Kalis Staff
item.desc: A staff capable of reaching the highest potential of its kind.

item.name: Ultimate Kalis Staff
item.desc:
A Kalis staff at its maximum potential.
It has a low chance of being crafted when upgrading a Kalis staff.

- Restore Max Durability: Kalis Staff of Crimson Flame, Kalis Staff of Destruction, Kalis Staff of Temptation, Kalis Staff

item.name: Kalis Staff of Temptation
item.desc:
The energy of Temptation is contained within this Kalis Staff.
It can be developed by Refining a common Kalis Staff.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Kalis Staff of Temptation, Kalis Staff

item.name: Kalis Staff of Destruction
item.desc:
The energy of Destruction is contained within this Kalis Staff.
It can be developed by Refining a common Kalis Staff.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Kalis Staff of Destruction, Kalis Staff

item.name: Kalis Staff of Crimson Flame
item.desc:
The energy of Crimson Flame is contained within this Kalis Staff.
It can be developed by Refining a common Kalis Staff.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Kalis Staff of Crimson Flame, Kalis Staff

item.name: Kalis Shortsword
item.desc: A Shortsword capable of reaching the highest potential of its kind.

item.name: Ultimate Kalis Shortsword
item.desc:
A Kalis Shortsword developed to its maximum potential.
There is a small chance this will be developed when Refining a common Kalis Shortsword.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Kalis Shortsword of Crimson Flame, Kalis Shortsword of Destruction, Kalis Shortsword of Temptation, Kalis Shortsword
